description: This file is an HTML source representing a web-based database viewer interface, including styles and client-side JavaScript for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the view.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles expansion of a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell with proper handling of large/complex content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses table cell content for better viewing.

search-terms: client-side JavaScript for dynamic data loading
CSS styling for responsive database UI
